_comment: This config file is made up of categories for the different phases of build each phase as a list of rules.  Rules are made up of an array of [comment, condition, operation]
SourceRetriever: If there is no SourceRetriever config, create an empty one
If source control type not specified, default to github
If no api token specified, use environment variable
If no organization specified, default to pentaho
StatusUpdater: If there is no StatusUpdater config, create an empty one
If github SourceControlType and null StatusUpdateType, use github
If github SourceControlType and StatusUpdaterType and null ApiToken, use the one from SourceRetriever
If github SourceControlType and StatusUpdaterType and null Organization, use the one from SourceRetriever
If github SourceControlType and StatusUpdaterType and null Repository, use the one from SourceRetriever
If github SourceControlType and StatusUpdaterType and null PullRequest, use the one from SourceRetriever

CommandBuilder.BuildCommand: ant -Dtestreports.dir=bin/reports/unit-test -Djunit.jvmargs=-XX:PermSize=256m -f BUILD_FILE clean-all resolve jacoco && ant -Dpentaho.coding.standards.version=1.0.4 -Dtestreports.dir=bin/reports/integration-test -Djunit.jvmargs=-XX:PermSize=256m -f BUILD_FILE jacoco-integration test-js checkstyle

CommandBuilder: Some projects lose output when publishing locally

CommandBuilder.BuildCommand: ant -Dtestreports.dir=bin/reports/unit-test -Djunit.jvmargs=-XX:PermSize=256m -f BUILD_FILE clean-all resolve jacoco && ant -Dpentaho.coding.standards.version=1.0.4 -Dtestreports.dir=bin/reports/integration-test -Djunit.jvmargs=-XX:PermSize=256m -f BUILD_FILE jacoco-integration checkstyle

CommandBuilder: If there is no CommandBuilder config, create an empty one
If no build tool specified, use mvn
If mvn BuildTool and null BuildCommand, use default

CommandBuilder.BuildCommand: mvn -B -fn -DrunITs=true -f BUILD_FILE clean install && mvn -B -Dpentaho-coding-standards.version=1.0.4 -f BUILD_FILE site

CommandBuilder: If mvn BuildTool and null CleanupCommand, use default
If ant BuildTool and null BuildCommand, use default

CommandBuilder.BuildCommand: ant -Dtestreports.dir=bin/reports/unit-test -Djunit.jvmargs=-XX:PermSize=256m -f BUILD_FILE clean-all resolve jacoco && ant -Dpentaho.coding.standards.version=1.0.4 -Dtestreports.dir=bin/reports/integration-test -Djunit.jvmargs=-XX:PermSize=256m -f BUILD_FILE jacoco-integration checkstyle publish-local

CommandBuilder: If ant BuildTool and null CleanupCommand, use default

CommandBuilder.CleanupCommand: rm -r ~/.ivy2/local || echo no publish local to remove

CommandBuilder: If Expand not specified default to true
